name: LaboratoryTestsForHypertension
title: Laboratory Tests for Hypertension
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for lab  tests that are commonly performed on patients with hypertension.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Laboratory Test.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent  laboratory tests for a complete CBC, urinalysis complete panel, renal function and basic serum and plasma CBC 2000 panel.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Basic metabolic 1998 panel - Serum or Plasma
Basic metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
Comprehensive metabolic 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
Renal function 2000 panel - Serum or Plasma
CBC W Auto Differential panel - Blood
CBC with Ordered Manual Differential panel - Blood
Complete blood count (hemogram) panel - Blood by Automated count
